comments:
Build 20040428 + JDTCore as of nightly build N20040430.

If you patch Eclipse with a version of JDTCore without the compatibility layer, 
it will dump lots of exception during startup when reopening a self-hosting 
workspace previously created.

The Java perspective cannot open.

addressing the problem.

Created an attachment (id=10158)
Zipped configuration folder of install before attempting to patch
